name: Less Hugging, More Mugging
description:
You are The Redemptioner - a particularly violent vigilante, preparing for your next takedown.

Problem is, your guns are powered by death, so you usually kill more than you save in order to shoot good enough to take down whatever freak of the week stumbles into your path!

The city's civilians, are they trying to stop you, or are they offering up their lives? You'll just have to find out!

Controls-

1,2,3: Change Weapons - Your guns grow stronger with each kill, but lose a level if someone else touches them. Going down to Level 0 will break them forever! Weapons also only reload while they're equipped.

WASD - Movement

Left Click - Shoot. 
[Red bar is ammunition, black bar is firing rate / reload speed.]
